t: In*pn that day the Lord*s with His severe sword, great and strong, Will*ld punish Leviathan the fleeing serpent, Leviathan*ld that twisted serpent; And*ld He will slay the reptile that is*i in the sea.
In*pn that day sing to her, “A*ld vineyard of red wine!
I,*ld the Lord,*s keep it, I*ld water it every moment; Lest*ld any hurt it, I*ld keep it night and day.
Fury*ld is*i not in Me. Who*ld would set briers and*i thorns Against*ld Me in battle? I*ld would go through them, I*ld would burn them together.
Or*ld let him take hold of My strength, That*ild he may make peace with Me; And*ild he shall make peace with Me.”
Those*ln who come He shall cause to take root in Jacob; Israel*ld shall blossom and bud, And*ld fill the face of the world with fruit.
Has*ln He struck Israel as He struck those who struck him? Or*ld has He been slain according to the slaughter of those who were slain by Him?
In*ld measure, by sending it away, You*ld contended with it. He*ld removes it*i by His rough wind In*ld the day of the east wind.

Therefore*ld by this the iniquity of Jacob will be covered; And*ld this is*i all the fruit of taking away his sin: When*ld he makes all the stones of the altar Like*ld chalkstones that are beaten to dust, Wooden*ld images and incense altars shall not stand.
Yet*ld the fortified city will*i be*i desolate, The*ld habitation forsaken and left like a wilderness; There*ld the calf will feed, and there it will lie down And*ld consume its branches.

When*ld its boughs are withered, they will be broken off; The*ld women come and*i set them on fire. For*ld it is*i a people of no understanding; Therefore*ld He who made them will not have mercy on them, And*ld He who formed them will show them no favor.
And*ln it shall come to pass in that day That*ild the Lord*s will thresh, From*ld the channel of the River to the Brook of Egypt; And*ld you will be gathered one by one, O*ld you children of Israel.

So*ln it shall be in that day: The*ld great trumpet will be blown; They*ld will come, who are about to perish in the land of Assyria, And*ld they who are outcasts in the land of Egypt, And*ld shall worship the Lord*s in the holy mount at Jerusalem.
